content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day July 10, 2017 What is the 15-Minute Botnet? July 10, 2017 Becoming an Internet criminal is getting easier and easier. With only a few hundred dollars in hand and an Internet connection, anyone can obtain the software and support to build a botnet.
